name: Hellbound
summary: Classic First Person Shooter style game. Like the good old days. An action game focused on speed, gore, guns, and metal music. Inspired by the 90s’ classics with modern visuals and audio!
info:
• 别名: 地狱使者
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020年8月4日
  • 官方网站: http://hellboundgame.com/
  • 开发: Saibot Studios
  • 发行: Nimble Giant Entertainment
